casebody.data:
ZLOOP, INC.
v.
PARKER POE ADAMS & BERNSTEIN LLP, et al. 122PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 25, 2019 Gavin J. Reardon, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Zloop, INC. Amiel J. Rossabi, Attorney at Law, for Zloop, INC. Robert W. Fuller, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Parker Poe Adams & Bernstein, LLP, et al. Stuart L. Pratt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Parker Poe Adams & Bernstein, LLP, et al. Bonnie Keith Green, Attorney at Law, for Zloop, INC. Mark W. Merritt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Parker Poe Adams & Bernstein, LLP, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of July 2019 by Plaintiff to Dismiss Appeal with Prejudice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of July 2019."
